titleuserprofile.message: Below, choose the settings you want to use when clicking the gray lamp button. Each profile has its own features.

desregularuser.message: This is default and the regular setting for new users. When clicking the gray lamp button, this style will be applied to the current web page.

desnightowl.message: One click converts the page directly into a night theme with a clickable hyperlink. Click it again to return to normal view. Click the lamp button again to disable this feature.
